```js
class RadioGroupExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { value: "H" };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <RadioGroup
        name="office"
        value={this.state.value}
        onChange={e => this.setState({ value: e.target.value })}
      >
        <Radio value="H">Hungerford</Radio>
        <Radio value="P">Portland</Radio>
        <Radio value="C">Chicago</Radio>
      </RadioGroup>
    );
  }
}

<RadioGroupExample />;
```
